system.description: This spell functions like silent image, except that the figment activates when a specific condition occurs. The figment includes visual, auditory, olfactory, and thermal elements, including intelligible speech. You set the triggering condition (e.g. a special word) when casting; the trigger must be audible, tactile, olfactory, or visualâ€”not based on alignment or other non-obvious qualities. After triggering, the illusion lasts 1 round/level.

components.materialDescription: A bit of fleece and jade dust worth 25 gp.

system.target: Visual figment in 20-ft. cube + one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
